registration.SUBJECT: Verify your email at quarantineaid.in
registration.MESSAGE:
Hello %s.

Welcome! To verify your email, please click in this link:

%s/verify/%s

Thank you.

forgotPassword.SUBJECT: Password recovery at quarantineaid.in
forgotPassword.MESSAGE:
To recover the password for user: %s

click the following link:

%s/reset/%s

If this was a mistake, you can ignore this message.

Thank you.
